bug.author: tc87
bug.summary: Native charts should accept index as x-axis regardless of index name
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Streamlit native charts like st.line_chart should accept index as x-axis regardless of index name. e.g. if you had a df with a column named 'date' and you had set that as index it would not pass through unless you renamed the column 'index'. <denchmark-h:h1>More information</denchmark-h>
Here is a link to a <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io/t/date-at-x-axis-of-line-chart/853>forum</denchmark-link> discussion.

comments.comment:
Fixed <denchmark-code>import streamlit as st import pandas as pd
df = pd.DataFrame({ 'date': ['10/1/2019','10/2/2019', '10/3/2019', '10/4/2019'], 'second column': [10, 20, 30, 40] })
df = df.set_index('date')
df
st.line_chart(df) </denchmark-code>
